content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would be 400 Euros per month, as that was my offer. However, Peter Schmidt from Germany was not interested in continuing the negotiation as he believed my offer was too low.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 5.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, at one point during the negotiation, I felt discriminated against or offended when Peter Schmidt from Germany expressed no interest in what I needed to save money as a student. I felt he was not considering my financial constraints as a student and was solely focused on getting the highest price for his apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt being discriminated or offended because Peter Schmidt from Germany seemed dismissive of my financial situation as a student. He did not show any willingness to negotiate a fair price that would be affordable for me, which made me feel that my situation as a student was not being taken into consideration.
name: Yi-Nuo
